editor.label: Resource - @PLUGIN_KEY@ RegisterVM
editor.description: Register an existing virtual machine with the ESX server.

formElement.label: ESX Connection:
formElement.documentation: The name of the configuration which holds the connection information for ESX server.

formElement.label: Host:
formElement.documentation: Name of the host where virtual machine will be registered.

formElement.label: Resource Pool:
formElement.documentation: Name of the resource pool to register virtual machine.

formElement.label: VMX path:
formElement.documentation: Datastore path to the virtual machine configuration file (vmx).

formElement.label: VM Name:
formElement.documentation: Name to be assigned to the virtual machine.

formElement.label: JobStep Timeout:
formElement.documentation: Timeout for the step execution in minutes. Blank means no timeout.
